name: PathPilot
long_description:
PathPilot helps PLG SaaS companies understand what drives upgrades and cancellations by transforming session data into actionable insights.
* AI-powered session summaries – Automatically generates second-by-second narrations of user behavior, making it easy to spot friction points and successes.
*  Conversion & churn insights – Identify the key actions that led to an upgrade or drop-off, so you can optimize your product for growth.
one_liner: Optimize SaaS revenue by understanding user behavior
